request.description: Move an Object identified by `{commercePaymentId}` to the recycling bin.

query.description: The name of a property whose values are unique for this object type

request.description: Perform a partial update of an Object identified by `{commercePaymentId}`. `{commercePaymentId}` refers to the internal object ID by default, or optionally any unique property value as specified by the `idProperty` query param. Provided property values will be overwritten. Read-only and non-existent properties will be ignored. Properties values can be cleared by passing an empty string.

query.description: The name of a property whose values are unique for this object type
The name of a property whose values are unique for this object type

item.name: Create or update a batch of commerce payments by unique property values

request.description: Create or update records identified by a unique property value as specified by the `idProperty` query param. `idProperty` query param refers to a property whose values are unique for the object.
